name: The Fox and the Wolf
description:
Description: Eva is incredibly excited for the annual autumn festival, The food, the scenery, and the games, what's their not to love about it? But before she can go to her beloved festival she has to deliver some baked good to her sick aunt that'll miss out on all the fun. Her mother tells her to deliver them before the festival starts and warns her not to take the short cut into the woods...

_

-

-

-

Warning: this game is not finished and is a bit wonky but I do plan too add more stuff later on but this was all I could pull together.
